original_text: And more than ever believers were added to the Lord, multitudes of both men and women,
korean_text: 믿고 주께로 나아오는 자가 더 많으니 남녀의 큰 무리더라

sentences.original_text: And more than ever believers were added to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 어느 때보다도 믿는 사람들이 주께 더해졌습니다

sentences.original_text: multitudes of both men and women
